description:
Hino tries to immerse herself in practice to keep from feeling that pang of guilt for placing 2nd. She`s so immersed in practice that she doesn`t even think about the upcoming mid term exam. Lili, seeing her neglect her studies, takes away her violin until after the mid terms. Lili tells Hino that she shouldn`t ignore things like sleep to practice the violin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: かけがえなきメロディ
